name: GDW Death Knight
description:
Death Knight is a challenging action adventure game set in a medieval dark fantasy in Lich’s Dungeon. It is a 2D slasher action game with heavy emphasis on skill and exploration.

FEATURES

• Explore a vast, creepy world of zombies.

• 2D animation brings creatures and characters to life..

• Fluid and responsive action allows you to flow through combat like water.

• Challenging gameplay
